text: Michael John Smith (1937 â€“ July 2021) was an English football manager. He managed the Wales and Egypt national teams and Hull City. His managing career lasted from 1974 until 1995. His death was announced on 22 July 2021. He was 84. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:English footballers Category:English football managers
